t: Endless.com: Amazon Busts Out of Its Brand - Bloomberg
s: January 3, 2007 - For the first time, Amazon.com has created a retail Web site that isn't branded Amazon. Endless.com, just out in beta, sells shoes and handbags, a hot area that Gap recently jumped into with PiperLime and that's populated by fast-growing successes such as Zappos.
